block.p: WEISBACH-Isidore. On August 28, 1997. Loving father of Priscilla Fadale, Susan Gordon, both of Florida and Nina Palmer of Massachusetts. Cherished grandfather of seven. Beloved brother of Pearl Handschuh and uncle to many nieces and nephews. Also survived by Henrietta and Seymour Bogorad, friends for life. Funeral services will be held Sunday, 1 PM, at Sharon Gardens Cemetery. For further information call Weinstein Memorial Chapel, 800-468-3232.
